query: SELECT s.name, COUNT(DISTINCT m.id) as count FROM manuals m JOIN subjects s ON m.subjectId = s.id WHERE s.name LIKE '%Chimica%' OR s.name LIKE '%Istologia%' GROUP BY s.name;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2SqZsxfbXQHvi7k.root --database EnsVFtthx7GmB9n2DgDusz --execute SELECT s.name, COUNT(DISTINCT m.id) as count FROM manuals m JOIN subjects s ON m.subjectId = s.id WHERE s.name LIKE '%Chimica%' OR s.name LIKE '%Istologia%' GROUP BY s.name;
stdout:
name	count
Chimica Generale	99
Chimica Organica	44
Istologia	12
